Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory110.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla slashes the closed cabin door a few times, bashing it out of shape.'}
{3: 'And then—'}
{3: 'She kicks the door away.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena, you there...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The interior of the cabin is barely visible under the dim emergency lights.'}
{3: 'A terminal near the wall is still running. It displays many charts and data.'}
{3: "The terminal's control panel has been ripped off, with a few connectors plugged in. On the other side of the cables..."}
{3: 'Was the lifeless remains of half a humanoid... Leaning on the corner.'}
{3: 'Her hands lay limply on the floor. Her eyes empty. Life has left her body.'}
{3: 'Ayla puts her scythe down. She slowly approaches and crouches down—'}
{3: 'As she gradually reaches out for her face—'}
{3: 'The carcass suddenly jerks, as if she had felt Ayla.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla is shocked for a split second, but she regains her composure immediately.'}
{3: 'The dark eyes of the carcass start to light up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Selena... Thank goodness... You're alive.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Selena's sound unit seems to have been heavily damaged. Her voice comes out bitter and strange."}
{3: 'As if she is concerned about her voice, she no longer makes any sound.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Don't worry, Selena. I'll run some checks now, and I'll bring you back. We can get you a new body then.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla starts to check Selena's various body functions."}
{3: 'Fortunately, Selena is a support-type Construct; so her infection level was kept under the threshold.'}
{3: "Ayla believes that Selena's strong will to survive must have also helped."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Great, looks like you will last until we get home.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla looks at Selena, then the terminal that she is connected to.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Did you survive only because of the energy from this space station terminal...?'}
{3: "How Selena struggled through many dark days was beyond Ayla's imagination."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Right, the song...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'You connected yourself to the terminal, then added your song to the interference signal broadcasted by the space station...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's how you did it, right? Selena, you must've been waiting for me to notice...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Sorry, I came too late...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I'm bringing you home, right now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just when Ayla is about to unplug Selena from the terminal...'}
{3: 'The terminal screen changes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "This is... the space station's database...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'And surveillance camera footage... Wait, is this Gray Raven?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gray Raven members can be seen on the ring of the gravity room. They looked clueless.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Selena... Do you want me to help them?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "But the communication device here isn't functioning...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "...Okay, I'll try to find another terminal nearby.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hope this won't take too long...", 4: '1'}
